entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Drizzle, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 2:33 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Drizzle
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: NNE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing drizzle or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or snow changing to rain this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
